=System,!RebuildVars=
Rebuild the system variable table
==Syntax==
{{{
System,REBUILDVARS
}}}
This is a successor of [systemRefreshVars System,RefreshVars], which since WB076 in most cases is no longer necessary (or supported)

=== Example: === 
{{{
Set,%First%,first
Set,%Result%,"Here is %first%"
Echo,Value of #$pResult#$p is: %Result%
// >> Here is first
Set,%First%,second
Echo,Value of #$pResult#$p is: %Result%
// >> Here is first
System,RebuildVars
Echo,Value of #$pResult#$p is: %Result%
// >> Here is second 
}}}
